p: While preparing viral stocks we noticed differences in plaque morphology on Vero cells between the four ZIKV isolates ( Figure 1). Plaques from the historical ZIKV AF were smaller than plaques from the Asian lineage isolates and were more uniform in size ( Figure 1A). Of the Asian lineage isolates, both ZIKV CDN and ZIKV PR produced plaques with indefinite borders, whereas the plaques from the ZIKV BR had clearly defined edges ( Figure 1A). In order to better characterize each viral isolate, we investigated strain-specific differences in growth kinetics, cytopathicity, infectivity, and viral RNA accumulation.
